title: Yall need to nerf cho gath's damage
body: He builds full tank and he can still one shot our adc wtf

replies.body: His Q is easy as hell to dodge and he is probably the most kitable champ in the game, if the ADC is getting chomped they deserve to die, try stutter stepping perhaps or, i dunno, peeling?

I agree, its fucked..

and have a good hard think... Does he REALLY need a 60% slow AFTER knocking you up in the air?

a tank with that much cc and damage is just wrong.
